rows.label: tlk42350124_04_msg0001
rows.name: Well, if it isn't the true heroes.

rows.label: tlk42350124_04_msg0002
rows.name: Listen, I've got a job for you guys.

rows.label: tlk42350124_04_msg0003
rows.name:
The thing about us Phonexes is, fighting
isn't really our strong suit, y'know?

rows.label: tlk42350124_04_msg0004
rows.name:
When we're on the move to a new
settlement, we get attacked by
Sauros a lot.

rows.label: tlk42350124_04_msg0005
rows.name:
So I figure, you're a tough bunch.
Maybe you could help out?
